subject: unanswered
description_text: I am wondering if anybody from customer service could answer my request or if you prefer i could send a letter handwritted.  ticket reference:   #6279

conversations.body_text: Hi, it's been stuck in the country of origin for 3 days now, and which courier is it coming through?

Hi TryerFpv,    We sincerely apologise for the delay in responding—recently we have been extremely busy. I note that your logistics tracking has been updated.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2531700200700127
Hello, good afternoon. I would like to know which courier is shipping my order and if you could provide me with the tracking number. I still have a tracking number from China. Thank you.

Hello, I just received a notification with the last mile tracking number UU844416732CN, indicating that the shipment is entering the country via the national postal service. I paid for the fastest and most expensive shipping option available in my shopping cart, and after responding to a support ticket (which they claimed was very busy) to have it shipped from their warehouse, I now find out it's being sent via a method I neither paid for nor agreed to when I purchased the pedals. The excuse given was the Chinese New Year. This is a terrible shipping service. This will be my last purchase from you, and I will not recommend you (as I already have to four friends). It's not because of the product itself, because the product is good, but your service is VERY BAD...

Hello, two days ago I submitted a ticket regarding a shipping issue on your end. It shows as being with Correo Argentino (Argentine Post), which wasn't the agreement. I've already experienced significant delays with them; the product has been in transit for 12 days now, even though I paid for a shorter delivery time and haven't even received a notification from Correo Argentino. I request a refund for my purchase. These were not the conditions agreed upon in my purchase, and I urgently expect my refund.

Hello, could you at least tell me which courier is handling my order SSN3388?
Are they not going to answer?

Hi TryerFpv,     Your order has been shipped via YunExpress. The screenshot below shows the tracking information. We apologize for any delay in our email response due to the Black Friday period.   Here is the tracking number : YT2531700200700127. You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/.

Hello, they sent my order using a method I didn't choose, and they're
making me pay $80 USD in taxes, when UPS, DHL, etc., which I paid for,
don't charge that exorbitant amount! Please fix this problem.
